archimate:Assessment.name: Aki envisions increasing AI usage
archimate:Assessment.documentation:
Rationale: Aki would love the auditing of Security Baseline compliance to be done with some kind of AI solution.
Aki envisions an AI-driven solution for auditing Security Baseline compliance, harnessing the capabilities of machine learning and data analytics to automate the monitoring and enforcement of security standards. This would not only increase the efficiency and accuracy of compliance checks but also allow for real-time insights and proactive issue resolution. By deploying AI, Aki wants to elevate the organization's security posture to a new level of sophistication, where continuous improvement is driven by intelligent analysis and predictive capabilities.
